@PhuckleI There is no such insinuation. Rural people and communities care deeply about health and the environment. Just transition means supporting and facilitating change. Govt incompetence and indifference to struggling families in a cost of living crisis is the issue causing disgust

@ThatVeganScot @GrainneFerris This isn't an abstraction. People and families cannot be left in the cold. The ball is in govts court - including the Greens - to mitigate and protect those families.

@ThatVeganScot @GrainneFerris There is no mitigation or just transition for people/families affected. That is the very point. It's Govt's job to get this right. They are failing. Struggling families are at best an afterthought. This is about poverty/struggling families/cost of living crisis denial.  Not on.

Another day in the Dail. Taoiseach fails again to answer question put to him. He resorts again to attacking the questioner instead. The proposed ban on turf is wrong & should not proceed. Govt backbenchers can put a stop to it by supporting the Sinn Féin motion this evening.
